title: Ikenie Akujo No Shiroi Kekkon - Mezametara 8-Nengo, Katsute Wa Goei Datta Koushaku-Sama No Dekiai Ni Naremasen!
alternative_title: 生贄悪女の白い結婚～目覚めたら8年後、かつては護衛だった公爵様の溺愛に慣れません！～ ; The Wicked Sacrifice's Happy Marriage - Waking up After 8 Years, She's Not Used to the Duke's, Her Former Guard's, Doting!
status: 生贄悪女の白い結婚～目覚めたら8年後、かつては護衛だった公爵様の溺愛に慣れません！～ ; The Wicked Sacrifice's Happy Marriage - Waking up After 8 Years, She's Not Used to the Duke's, Her Former Guard's, Doting!
description:
Description :
        A love story about Ninette, a baroness, and Till, her escort. The story begins when Ninette, whose political marriage has been consummated, is reunited with Till, who has become a duke and her fiancé. Ten years before their reunion, Ninette's stepmother and stepson had taken over her house, and she was living with Till in a cabin in a corner of the mansion. In fact, Ninette has a condition that attracts the opposite sex, and because of this, she is slandered and called an evil woman. One day, Ninette and Till go to town on her stepmother's errand and get into some trouble. (natalie.mu translated).
